text: “If you go on Arabic television, as we have, and you look at what is being blasted out — video of Mr Trump being translated to Arabic,” Clinton said at an Iowa town hall last month. “ ‘No Muslims coming to the United States,’ other kinds of derogatory, defamatory statements — it is playing into the hands of the violent jihadists.”
title: Donald Trump featured in new jihadist recruitment video

meta_data.description: The video includes a clip of Trump calling on the United States to bar Muslims from entering the country
